Si Michael Schumacher (Enero 3, 1969) met ya saray propesyonal a race driver manipud Alemanya. Enggana met ya tanikala ed Formula 1 manipud 1991 pakasaray 2006 ken 2010 pakasaray 2012. Say lapud na, ibwag na so 91 Grand Prix ken agak-ekel so pitak a titulo (1994, 1995, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, tan 2004).[1] Sakey ya embahador na UNESCO, si Schumacher so akibiang ed saray proyekto a panangiter na tulong ed totoo tan angidonasyon na nilibon dolyar ed saray charity. Nen Disyembre 2013, si Schumacher et asakitan na graben utek diad aksidente ed skiing. Sikatoy niwala ed komad-medical coma anggad Hunyo 2014. Sikatoy tinmaynan ed ospital diad Grenoble pian manpa-rehabilitate ed Lausanne University Hospital, antis ya inyalis ed abung to pian makaawat na medikal a panagtambal tan private rehabilitation nen Setyembre 2014.
